channel.title: Drunkonjava? Is this you?!
channel.description:
I was googling around, and someone named drunkonjava posted this:
This is pathetic. Runescape does not run on Linux servers. That is a rumor. Runescape actually runs on Aryan, so you can't hack Runescape if the server does not exist... There are no true hacks other than a few undetected stat editors. Ex: My editor. If you could change an account to all 99 stats Jagex would notice, so you will have to keep it off of the leaderboards. Before you try to scam innocent players, make sure you know what you are talking about.
Heres the link: http://www.realpoor.com/REAL_RUNESCAPE_HACK__I_CRACKED_LINUX_SERVERS_t50985.html I found it slightly amusing.

Oman, you are badass.
